author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
A well of black gold rests and stirs,
Gains held on wings of China's spurs,
Their stimulus a calming balm,
To keep economy from harm.

The humble dollar, worn and tossed,
Rises up, its losses lost,
Fed comments sway the trader's fate,
Decisions made on data's gate.

A shadow cast o'er bank's fair land,
Claims of a grip, Party's strong hand,
Communist whispers, doubts now sown,
Infrastructure's tale is grown.

feedItems.title: Oil Holds Gains Following China Stimulus
feedItems.description: Oil prices were flattish in Europe but holding onto gains from the previous session that came after China took steps to stimulate its economy.

feedItems.title: Dollar Rises After Earlier Losses as Traders Assess Fed Decision
feedItems.description: The dollar edged higher in Europe after earlier hitting a five-week low as investors continued to digest Powell’s comments on future rate hikes, with upcoming decisions to depend on data, Commerzbank said.

feedItems.title: China-Led Infrastructure Bank Just Can't Escape the Communist Party's Shadow
feedItems.description: The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank says it will conduct an internal review after former executive claims China’s Communist Party has infiltrated the institution.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
Of Ukrainë's prancing horses bold,
And mines laid thick in soils of war,
Tho' knights do charge with hearts of gold,
Their foes' defense, a bitter snare.

In realm of Dragon Red, Micron,
Aye, blacklisted by lordly frown,
Yet still its coffer gladly shone,
Six hundred millions to lay down.

Upon fair Londën's market scene,
The metals gleam and prices rise,
As Chïna dreams of plentious sheen,
And augurs hope in merchants' eyes.

feedItems.title: 'Mines Everywhere': Ukraine's Offensive Is Proving a Hard Slog
feedItems.description: After the first probing attacks yielded mixed results, Ukrainian forces have mostly paused their assaults as commanders try to figure out how to punch through Russian lines without taking huge losses.

feedItems.title: Micron, Blacklisted by Beijing, to Pump $600 Million Into China Expansion
feedItems.description: Investment by biggest U.S. maker of memory chips comes about a month after major Chinese firms were banned from buying its products.

feedItems.title: Metals Tick Higher Amid Hopes of China Stimulus
feedItems.description: Base metals and gold prices were ticking higher in London, with hopes of post-Covid stimulus being introduced in China helping to negate the current downturn in demand for industrial goods.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
From heavenly city, Rome's palace of faith,
Hernia stroke down, the Pope in battle worn.
Yet jovial he standeth, merciful wraith,
"Still alive," the pontiff laughs, spirits unshorn.

Amidst the realm, so Eurozone be named,
The balance bendeth 'twixt trades and holdings,
In Citi's eye, the market's course proclaimed,
To technical seas, each bond unfolding.

In halls of Tesco, sales abound and soar,
As Aegir blow, an 8.2% gale,
To year's full bounty, steadfastness they swore,
With lofty quest and journey unwrapped sail.

feedItems.title: Pope Francis Released From Hospital After Operation for Hernia
feedItems.description: The pontiff, 86, looked tired but cheerful as he greeted a gaggle of reporters outside a Rome hospital. “Still alive,” he said, when asked how he was.

feedItems.title: Market Technicals Seen Driving Eurozone Bonds Near Term
feedItems.description: The ECB signaled its intentions with bond reinvestments, leaving the eurozone government bond market to be moved by technicals, such as supply-demand balance, Citi said.

feedItems.title: Tesco Backs Full-Year Views
feedItems.description: Tesco said its like-for-like group retail sales grew 8.2% in the first quarter of fiscal 2024, boosted by volumes and inflation, and reiterated its guidance for the full year.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
In fair Disney's realm a tempest brews,
Christine McCarthy, with swan's song must yield,
A clash of thine execs, conjures the news,
Exit nigh, associates gaze, perturb'd afield.

From eastern shores, where dragons rise and sway,
Infrastructure stocks ascend, a glint of gold,
A rousing revelation doth pave the way,
In bonds of treasury, tales of growth foretold.

And lo, fair Adena of Nasdaq's fame,
In quest of knowledge dark, her dealings wrought,
Great deals complete, defying stifling flame,
A black belt earned, in battle fiercely fought.

feedItems.title: Disney CFO Clashed With Executives Before Stepping Down
feedItems.description: Christine McCarthy’s exit caught some colleagues and associates by surprise.

feedItems.title: China Infrastructure Stocks Rise, Buoyed by Report of Coming Stimulus
feedItems.description: Hong Kong-listed infrastructure stocks rose after a report that Beijing is considering issuing $140 billion in special treasury bonds to finance infrastructure projects and other initiatives to boost economic growth.

feedItems.title: Nasdaq CEO Adena Friedman Pursues a Black Belt in Dealmaking
feedItems.description: She agreed to the largest deal in the company’s history. “I tend to take a competitive approach to life.”
